spec_data.Name: copr-dist-git
spec_data.Description:
COPR is lightweight build system. It allows you to create new project in WebUI
and submit new builds and COPR will create yum repository from latest builds.

This package contains Copr services for Dist Git server.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 07 Sep 2017 09:56:23 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Copr services for Dist Git server
